coreAttributes.name: Harpy Perfume
coreAttributes.description: A bright pink glass bottle of what looks to be a kind of feminine perfume. There's a stylised image of a harpy's feather etched into the base of the bottle, but other than that, it bears no markings.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
A soothing wave of arcane energy washes over [npc.name]...

[#npc.incrementFemininity(1)] [#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_DAMAGE_LUST, 5)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: Spraying a little squirt of the Harpy Perfume onto [npc.her] neck, [npc.name] [npc.verb(take)] in a deep breath of its intoxicating feminine scent. Curiously, after just one spray the bottle of perfume is completely emptied, and as [npc.name] [npc.verb(throw)] it away, [npc.she] [npc.verb(feel)] a bubbly wave of excitement running through [npc.herHim], and without thinking, [npc.she] [npc.verb(let)] out a very girly giggle.
